title: Sequencing and Informatics in Grasses & Cereals
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The project has just started but the objective is to interact at the interface of bioinformatics and crop science to ensure that the benefits of genomics become deployed.
findingsText: The project has just started, but we have already met in the UK and agreed to hold a workshop in Australia on how we can utilise sequencing and bioinformatics to improve crops with a focus on genomic selection. The objective is to interact at the interface of bioinformatics and crop science to ensure that the benefits of genomics become deployed. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Energy,Environment
